title: Update KR Staffing brand logo and favicon static assets

requirements.summary: Replace the existing brand logo asset at the current static path so Header/Footer automatically render the new KR Staffing logo without any UI code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`.
The Header logo (`frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx` img src `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`) renders the new uploaded logo on all screen sizes.
The Footer logo (`frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx` img src `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`) renders the new uploaded logo.
No routes, navigation links, or other UI behavior changes occur as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Add/overwrite the static logo image at this exact path using the uploaded KR Staffing logo artwork, ensuring the output is a wide 512x128 PNG so existing Header/Footer img src continues to work with no code changes.

requirements.summary: Generate and set a matching favicon derived from the uploaded logo artwork while keeping the existing favicon path referenced by index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png`.
`frontend/index.html` continues to reference `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png` and the browser tab favicon updates to the new icon after refresh.
The favicon is visually legible at small sizes (16–32px) and not cropped awkwardly.

file_operations.description: Add/overwrite the static favicon image at this exact path derived from the uploaded KR Staffing logo artwork, ensuring a 64x64 PNG that remains legible at 16–32px and avoids awkward cropping.
Confirm the favicon <link rel='icon'> continues to reference `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png` (no path changes), so the updated icon is picked up after refresh.
